amendment.description: To authorize appropriations for fiscal years 2004 and 2005 for the United States Coast Guard, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2954 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2954 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S3387) To authorize appropriations for fiscal years 2004 and 2005 for the United States Coast Guard, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2954 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2954 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
